message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CL, cs.CC, cs.AI, cs.SD 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the use of gesture in a face-to-face collaborative design meeting and aims to formulate specifications for remote collaborative-design systems. This suggests a focus on human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and natural language processing (cs.CL) in the context of collaborative computing (cs.CC). Additionally, the paper discusses the cognitive psychology behind gesture use, which could fall under artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and software development (cs.SD) categories.
